supplier_of: farm machines | weather stations | automatic watering
information: Caipos GmbH produces weather, wireless soil moisture, precipitation, water level monitoring systems. The main advantage of our products is that we offer truly wireless decision for storage monitoring. Communication range up to 2 km. 16 wireless sensor nodes can be connected to one system. Every wireless node supports 4 temperature sensors. As result, up to 64 sensors can be connected to one system. Wireless sensors are more reliable then cable based. Unlike in cable based network, failure of one sensor does not affect the rest of the system. Wireless sensors can be placed to any location and relocated or removed any time. They do not hider agricultural machinery processing. All our systems are internet based. Free web space is provided for every station with instant access to data of last 5 years. Data older than 5 years is archived and available on request. Web application can also be installed on customerâ€™s hardware.
